thread.title: Jaimes Rojas Sebastian
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Jaimes Rojas Sebastian

author: Jaimes Rojas Sebastian
title: Jaimes Rojas Sebastian
text: You hired me a car in bad condition. the car broke down in the middle of the road because it runs out of battery, and I had to spend time asking to help on the phone and waiting for someone to help me. when I dropped off the car, I had to pay for the petrol, I don't know why but it wasn't my fault that you hired me a car with a didn't work battery
